title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1865/88 of 30 June 1988 suspending customs duties in trade in beef and veal between Spain and the Community as constituted at 31 December 1985
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1865/88
of 30 June 1988
suspending customs duties in trade in beef and veal between Spain and the Community as constituted at 31 December 1985
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The customs duties pursuant to Article 75 (1) of the Act of Accession and applicable to trade in the products covered by Regulation (EEC) No 805/68 between Spain and the Community as constituted at 31 December 1985 shall be suspended from 1 July 1988.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 363, 23. 12. 1987, p. 32.
